text: Inn ki chahat to yeh kay jiss tarah kay kafir woh hain tum bhi unn ki tarah kufur kerney lago aur phir sab yaksan ho jao pus jab tak yeh islam ki khatir watan na choren inn mein say kissi ko haqeeqi dost na banao phir agar yeh mun pher len to enhen pakro aur qatal kero jahan bhi yeh haath lag jayen khabardaar! Inn mein say kissi ko apna rafiq aur madadgar na samajh bethna
